/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the urban landscape. The street below is a hive of activity, with cars and buses navigating their way through the city's arteries. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the sides of the street, their facades a testament to the architectural diversity of the city. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a sunny day. The sun casts its bright rays onto the scene, illuminating the cityscape with a warm glow. The image is a snapshot of urban life in Beijing, encapsulating the rhythm and energy of the city.
